1.content: Never before have I encountered you. My name is Leit.

2.content: Ususally I tend to the ancient cacti of my homelands.

3.content: Today is my day off, and I am watering the beautiful plants of Geocity.

repeat.name: Liet
repeat.content: The shifting sands of the Great Litterbox are unforgiving,

r1.content: ...but its arid winds evaporate any feelings which failure creates.

r2.content: Perhaps one day we can visit my village and share a pot of cactus tea.
